mapper.select: select c.cou_code, i.ins_name, c.cou_name, c.opendate, c.approve, c.final_approve, (select count(*) from course_registration where cou_code=c.cou_code) regist_cnt from courses c, instructor i where c.ins_id=i.ins_id

select c.COU_CODE, c.INS_ID, c.COU_NAME, c.CONTENT, c.BANNER_IMG, c.COU_PERIOD, c.SAMPLE_VIDEO, c.HITS, c.CC_CODE,INS_NAME, INS_INTRODCE, INS_EMAIL, INS_TEL, INS_PROFILE,SC_NAME, MC_NAME from COURSES c, INSTRUCTOR i,MAINCATEGORY mc , SUBCATEGORY sc where c.cou_code = #{couCode} and i.ins_id = c.ins_id and mc.mc_code = sc.mc_code and c.sc_code = sc.sc_code
select count(COMPLETION_STATUS) from COURSE_REGISTRATION where cou_code = #{couCode} and COMPLETION_STATUS = 'Y'
